snippet: EA Sports dropped the Blackhawks forward as a spokesman for its video game NHL 16 because he is under police investigation.
abstract: Video game maker EA Sports scrubs Chicago Blackhawks star winger Patrick Kane from cover of its upcoming release NHL 16 because of rape charges leveled against him.
lead_paragraph: EA Sports dropped the Blackhawks forward as a spokesman for its video game NHL 16 because he is under police investigation.

headline.print_headline: Kane Taken Off Cover of Video Game
